About me
I study animal movement ecology, which includes inferring animal behavioral states, space use, and resource selection from biotelemetry data collected on both aquatic and terrestrial organisms.



Experience
ORISE Postdoctoral Fellow (2023-present) – USGS EESC
NSF Postdoctoral Fellow (2021-2023) – Florida State University
Postdoctoral Research Associate (2019-2021) – University of Florida



Education
PhD WFSC (2019) Texas A&M University
BS BioSci (2013) Clemson University
